## getPartialClasses() function

Find classes on an element that partially match a value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getPartialClasses(searchType: 'startingwith' | 'containing' | 'endingwith', element: Element, partialValue: string): string[];
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The element to search.


</td></tr>
